website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for mountain bikers whose top concerns are ventilation and comfort - these features are where Smith Optics excels.
pros: Patented construction allows air to flow freely around helmet, and AirEvac technology moves hot air away from the face and head
Helmet is light at just 285 grams
Protection is a step up from EPS with co-polymer tubes, which absorb up to 30% more impact
cons: Some consumers say helmet is more comfortable and more successful at cooling in temperate conditions and colder weather

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and the visor is sporty and makes sense for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a recumbent biker and wanted a bike helmet other than those reserved for French racers. This is it. Looks great and the visor is sporty and makes sense for a longer ride. The helmet fits securely yet comfortably and headphones around the back of my neck are no problem with this model. Cool enough for me although my average trike speed is about 8-10 mph and periodically up to 20; little annoying wind noise heard. I will update if I experience the color fading. I'm out triking every 3 days or more.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-Devo

customer_reviews.title: Love it - camo looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool, high quality helmet, a little warm, but on the trails, in the trees, not a problem. On tarmac, in >90 deg and humid, maybe not the best choice, if you have a low heat tolerance. One star removed for middling, at best, ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: SR Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Really like my helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this helmet. I ordered a size medium because I was right at the high end for small and low end for medium. I was able to adjust the straps and back knob and it fit great. I also really like the color and my fellow mountain bike riders like the fact that they can easily see me because of the bright pink on my helmet. I have not taken a tumble with it, so how well it will protect my head I do not know, but I like the coverage on my head and feel I would be well protected. Would recommend this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: echohishome

customer_reviews.title: Saved from likely concussion!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Lightweight and saved my boyfriend from a likely head collision on his mtn bike. He was thrown over the bars at appx 30mph downhill and landed on his head and shoulder. The helmet took a beating and the smith company is replacing for us. Thankful we spent the extra money on a great helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Haley K

customer_reviews.title: This helmet is the gold standard!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is the gold standard! I am coming from a fox flux to this and there is night and day difference between the two. The forefront is incredibly light and the fit is just soooo much better and more adjustable than fox flux. I got the large which is what I always wear. It also comes with a handy little helmet bag as well. One of the main reasons I got this helmet is because of the go pro mounting capability. Although you need the go pro mounting kit sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chronic

customer_reviews.title: Cute color!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is lightweight and the color is cool. I wish I could say that it is comfortable on when riding, but it seems to slightly pitch me near my temples. I have played with the head adjustment sizes and it still kind of hurts. Its not bad enough to buy another one. My husband raves about this brand so I will just go with that. I love my brain so I will protect it.
customer_reviews.author: LaineTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet. Confortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helmet. Confortable and lightweight. Is not as cold as I expected for using in the tropics (where I live), but if you use early in the morning or in warm weather, is an excellent choice. In addition, I must say that I suffered an accident and the helmet performed outstanding in this situation. I just has a very small injury in my head after clashing with a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, breathable, and comfortable. Looks cool. Love the visor and the adjustment knob. If I had any complaint, it would be that the stick on piece for the goggle strap holder doesn't stick as well as it should. The headlight/action cam mount kit is a cool addition if you want a helmet-mounted light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a medium size helmet from Smith but sent it back because it was too large. My head size is 21 1/2" I ordered this one in a size small and it fit perfectly. It's summer and the helmet allows my head to stay cool when I bike.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan S.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down worth the $200+ price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down worth the $200+ price!!! It is light weight, breathes better than anything I have ever owned, and I get 3-4 compliments a day how cool it looks. I take it off and show the inside and people are instantly impressed. I held off buying this for a year because of how expensive it was, but I am so glad I took the plunge and bought it. Invest into protecting your brain.
customer_reviews.author: Nacho Husky

customer_reviews.title: This is the most comfortable helmet that I own.
customer_reviews.text: I like the added protection that the shape of of this helmet provides. It's also nice that the visor tips up when rolling down in the drops. It rides well on my head and doesn't move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yup!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for another member in the household. This helmet is of supreme quality and is super light. I wear a Bell allsports helmet and this Smith is a third the weight. Easy to adjust and looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and protection
customer_reviews.text: I believe this helmet will provide excellent protection especially for the back of the head. This helmet is not cheap, but ask yourself what is your head is worth. I use a Smith helmet for skiing as well. They are well made and have the features I needed for protection.
customer_reviews.author: American

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material but yet stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is the best helmet I have ever owned is the fit is exactly to what I need but it is nothing short of fantastic material when building it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Howard

customer_reviews.title: excellent helmet, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Helmet is cool and light - and I really like the honeycomb to keep bugs, leaves, and itchy things out. Adjustability and fit are excellent. Helmet comes with a very nice, protective storage / carry bag and an extra set of pads for inside.
customer_reviews.author: tio pablito

customer_reviews.title: honeycomb doesn't ventilate as well as you'd expect and is hot!
customer_reviews.text: lightweight but hot. I love the idea of the honeycomb structure however, cooling is not great. in fact is well below average. I live in Texas and was hoping with the honeycomb and more "openings" it would be cooler, but that is not the case. Great for winter time
customer_reviews.author: Krishna

customer_reviews.title: It is super comfortable and has a great look
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is the bomb! Or, if you are Millennial, it's dope! It is super comfortable and has a great look. Fortunately I have not yet tested the mellon protectioness (I know that's not a word) level.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R Lindsay Jr

customer_reviews.title: Not anywhere near as good as the reviews say
customer_reviews.text: Not anywhere near as good as the reviews say. I cant imagine why people rave about this helmet. Very hard to fit properly. Strap hardware and adjustments feel cheap compared to my Giro Feature. This helmet has bells and whistles but misses the fundamentals. I overpaid for it at $110. Edit: This helmet doesn't breathe well either. Not good for riding on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: This helmet does flow air through and fits so comfortable. It is a well built helmet
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues of overheating while riding in the middle of summer. This helmet does flow air through and fits so comfortable. It is a well built helmet. I find I can keep my head in a better postion with this visor than in previous helmets I was having to crank my neck up to see.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: One of the best MTB helmets on the market
customer_reviews.text: One of the best MTB helmets on the market. It is insanely light weight, it's ventilation is better than any other helmet I have ever worn. The price is steep, but if you're in the market for a new helmet it's hard to look past the Forefront.
customer_reviews.author: ryan curry

customer_reviews.title: Cool and cool...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great helmet - It has the best airflow of anything I have worn. perfect for Portland summer. Item arrived in perfect condition and undoubtedly the best helmet i have had,.my wife thinks i look like a stormtrooper though!! (I got white with blue inner)
customer_reviews.author: R. S. Croad

customer_reviews.title: I get one click down from max and it fits comfortably. Not a single complaint beside i got a ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a big head. This barely fits. I get one click down from max and it fits comfortably. Not a single complaint beside i got a big head. Not many helmets make it down to my ears but this one fits with just enough room for large frame sunglases.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bonewell

customer_reviews.title: dripping sweat is an issue
customer_reviews.text: runs super hot but i don't mind that too much. the brow pads drip sweat right in front of your eyes. Like A LOT. Makes me want to go to a Troy Lee.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and fit...
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit, a lot of thought has gone into this helmet. It's very comfortable, the chin straps are great and the goggle stay is a nice touch, but the design is a little Storm Trooper-ish though (i.e. bulky). Go a brighter color than the somewhat boring cement grey also.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: it's a wonderful helmet; light
customer_reviews.text: it's a wonderful helmet; light, breatheable but also really feels like it could take a good whack and protect the ole think tank. stylish. legit. only complaint i can think of comes from the sorta-sketchy adjuster guy that is surprisingly important when snapped, which this one can easily do, if measures are not taken to avoid it. it really holds the helmet on your head and the one i had in my last smith helmet snapped and it never stayed on the same, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: My all time fav helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. My first one stopped ratcheting down on my head after 3 years and 5,000 miles of riding. Seemed I got my use out of it
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: I had a really bad crash at 25mph on a downhill and my had ...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet saved my life. I had a really bad crash at 25mph on a downhill and my had slammed into the pavement. The helmet did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Incredible.
customer_reviews.text: Best bicycle helmet I've ever owned. Not only is it light, but the air flow is fantastic. I don't think I could move to another helmet after using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mockylock

customer_reviews.title: Comfort on this helmet is amazing, fits well on my head even with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfort on this helmet is amazing, fits well on my head even with a light hat in colder temps. Because of the honey comb design, you can't put any straps through the vents, so attaching a light or camera is a little more tricky.
customer_reviews.author: Veggie Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking and very lite for a Trail bike helmet
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking and very lite for a Trail bike helmet. I am at the exact end of the Large helmet's measurements and it starts to feel snug if my hair gets to long, it's also pretty tight if you like to wear a Halo sweat band like I do. Might want to try it on first before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Sarfino

customer_reviews.title: Now I'm super glad I got it
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one, but the price held me back. Now I'm super glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very light helmet.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is very light. However, it does not offer much ventilation, so you may sweat a lot. I wear a scull cap that wicks my head sweats and it cools off as I ride.
customer_reviews.author: Love to Golf

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet, nice fit, good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting and feeling helmet. I wish I wouldn't have gotten black as it gets very hot. Good padding and protection though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine K. Nordberg

customer_reviews.title: custumer service does not exist with this company!
customer_reviews.text: way overpriced! You can find the same quality helmets for 1/2 to two thirds cheaper. I have never gotton a reply from customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Ride smart!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific helmet. Even though it's listed as a mountain bike helmet, I'm using as my every day, commute to work helmet. It is light weight, fits well, adjust easily, and its bright color is hard to miss.I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hopps

customer_reviews.title: I think this is best suited for colder climates
customer_reviews.text: This helmet get hot, I think this is best suited for colder climates. The "glasses holder" broke off with in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal. It doesn't have the mips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. It doesn't have the mips, but you are getting a $200 helmet for 85 bucks. You can't beat that. Fits great and has excellent airflow- first ride was in 102 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Buy me!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet for mountain bike trails. Enough said!
customer_reviews.author: sportsfan

customer_reviews.title: Protects me head
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Honeycomb interior is a bit odd at first but helmet is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Waite

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and breathable. Easy to adjust the fit even with a thick braid. Love the color too!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I've had people tell me my expensive mountain bike was cool, but I've never had other riders complement my helmet... until today. It actually happened so I decided to put it in a review. This is a bad-ass looking helmet that is built as well as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: BilLowry

customer_reviews.title: Runs slightly large
customer_reviews.text: I received this rather quickly. The helmet is nice and good quality but doesn’t fit my head shape. POC works best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Liz V.

customer_reviews.title: I love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet, it looks cool and sits low on my head. The liner is great for keeping bugs from getting to my skull and biting me. Very light feeling and comfortable fit. Work every dollar. I haven't ordered the camera mounting kit yet but plan to and will rate that as well.
customer_reviews.author: stefhoff14

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. I got it a a decent price so I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Percy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great looking helmet. Fits true to size. Light weight. Decent air flow. You can see the honey comb construction would protect your head if you ever needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Firenze409

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like? Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Lightweight, matches our team colors and, best of all, no more bees or other flying insects getting stuck in my helmet!
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FIT, BRIGHT ORANGE , YOU CAN SEE ME KNOW!
customer_reviews.author: ALAN MONTOYA

customer_reviews.title: Were it every day an love it! high quality item
customer_reviews.text: Were it every day an love it! high quality item . Fit is Great . Would Highly recommend helmet to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design for 60cm head
customer_reviews.text: Poor design for 60cm head. Sizing chart states that the large helmet accommodates up to a 63 cm head, and while the head band did fit my head at 60 cm, the front portion of the chin strap was positioned uncomfortably right over my ears. No amount of adjustment could correct this. If the chin strap's front portion originated more anteriorly this helmet would have been useful. The overall quality seems nice. Maybe for someone with a smaller noggin, or someone with rear set ears this would be a good choice. I ordered a troy lee A1 as a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Crow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really like this moutain bike helmet, good looking, light weight and the sizing is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Laura A. Norberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet. Next one will have MIPS technology. And going to by a Smith helmet for snowboarding now.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well ventilated. Much more so than any other brand I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Cujo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Keeps my head cool
customer_reviews.text: nicest helmet I've ever owned. Comfortable. Keeps my head cool.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.

customer_reviews.title: Smith helmets are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Very comfortable and light. Exceeded my expectations. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet for me
customer_reviews.text: Light. Nice looking. Comfortable. Good sweat management. My next helmet would be the same from Smith but the MiPS version.
customer_reviews.author: Abe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great light-weight helmet. A little low on ventilation, worth it for extra safety.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was on time
customer_reviews.text: I like it, It’s fit on my head and comfortable than my Other helmet. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bostan

customer_reviews.title: Great design. I've been wearing it for a few ...
customer_reviews.text: Great design. I've been wearing it for a few months now and the fit is great but the ventilation is incredible. Very please with it I might even get it in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: great fit and light
customer_reviews.text: great fit and light. after 2 minutes of riding you forget you have a helmet on... thats the mark of comfort.
customer_reviews.author: John Romero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price point for a great product. A true fit for a hard to find large helmet need.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this helmet. Its not the right size for my head. The shape is round and at 59cm the sizes do not accommodate to my oval head. There is no good way to buy a helmet online. Even with measuring correctly in cm and inches. Having to pay return shipping @ $7 * I fitted the large/xl in store so I knew not to get a large, unfortunately the medium doesn't fit either. I wear a 7 1/2 hat size and measured @ 59 cm.
customer_reviews.author: Half&Hafu

customer_reviews.title: Cool Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this helmet, but note the orange is really neon "hunter vest" orange! The only reason for knocking one star off is the the straps. The front strap is a little to far rearward and touches the ear oddly. I have it set so that strap is a bit loose and that keeps it off my ear. If they would move it forward a bit it would be much more comfortable. Helmet vents real well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Smith optic Helmet great choice
customer_reviews.text: Great service. Quick and efficient. The helmet is light and tough. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Richard hawksley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful helmet. Plenty of ventilation and looks cool as hell.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Blaine

customer_reviews.title: I love the light weight and how well it is vented
customer_reviews.text: I love the light weight and how well it is vented. It also works great with my smith glasses. Couldn't buy a better helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helmets Save Lives
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is without a doubt the best to date. I've tried over my 20+ years of Mtn Biking several different brands, none at this point even come close to the Smith Forefront.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smith helmet
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is very adjustable. Helmet seems to keep me cool so I am satisfied.the bright color is visible and my fellow riders appreciate that as they can see me and know that we are still together. Only downside is you need to use their light holder to helmet mount a light or camera
customer_reviews.author: Ole Man Winter

customer_reviews.title: Sick of bees in your bonnet?
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a very well designed helmet. After being stung 3 times this summer getting bees in my helmet, I bought this helmet. It vents well is not heavier than my other helmet, and seems equally protective. The only drawback is that I cannot mount my helmet light on it, but my other helmet is now my night rider since bees are not out at night. Very comfortable, well built.
customer_reviews.author: Ya nosh

customer_reviews.title: Smith Good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lid much higher quality than typical helmets. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: steve mctaggart

customer_reviews.title: He couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our son who is an avid mountain biker. He couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Smith

customer_reviews.title: This helmet fits great, but it's really hot helmet even in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits great, but it's really hot helmet even in the winter in Phoenix. Recommend you only wear it in weather 60 degrees F or colder.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Cowles

customer_reviews.title: Loved this helmet
customer_reviews.text: Loved this helmet, I also ride a Harley-Davidson motorcycle and have had a hard time finding a good fitting helmet in the past
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I like the helmet but the visor isn't great - it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the helmet but the visor isn't great - it is flimsy and doesn't seem well designed. Also - the hardware for the camera/light mount is also a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: life warranty but wish it had a little better
customer_reviews.text: well made, life warranty but wish it had a little better ventalation
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: NOT mips
customer_reviews.text: Good poduct, size good... but is not MIPS ... as the advertiser said in response to a question that was asked to him ... bought the item especially for the MIPS feature ..... and the one I received is not ... dissappointed .... (mate pink / charcoal medium)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Smith Optics Forefront All Mountain Bike Helmet
product_meta.description: The team at Smith, having spent decades reducing lens fogging, knows quite a bit about ventilation. One look at the Forefront Helmet, with its breathable Koroyd tube structure, shows how willing they are to depart from convention to create a product that's truly great. The Koroyd tubes are tiny, extruded, co-polymer tubes that absorb about 30% more impact than traditional EPS foam, and, due to their hollow nature, allow air to flow freely in a way that foam simply can't. On top of that, the microstructures allow for less material to be used in the construction of the helmet, which adds up to a highly-protective helmet that weighs in at just about 285grams. It's not just a cool-looking helmet that protects your head, though. The AirEvac system, borrowed from its snow helmets, moves hot air away from your glasses or goggles to keep them fog-free. The visor has two positions to keep the sun out of your eyes, and there's also a threaded brass insert on the top of the helmet designed to accept aftermarket mounting kits for GoPro cameras and Light and Motion lights. The helmet's fit is secured via Smith's VaporFit retention system, which anyone familiar with Smith's snow line will be familiar with.
feature_bullets: Smith Optics Forefront Off-Road Cycling Helmet for Adult
